title: Thief BLES01982 DLC PACK + RETAIL FIX
description:
Fix for 4.46+ Update 1.01 - will fix problems people had with the retail version, especially on CFW 4.46, 4.50 and 4.53.




DLC Pack v2:

THE FORSAKEN - CHALLENGE MAP
- Explore a sinister abandoned facility, steal all its darker secrets and escape what may be lurking in the shadows.
- Challenge your friends and rediscover areas of the game with complete new rules.
- The player can play "The Forsaken Challenge Map" in 3 modes:
"CHAIN & GAIN" MODE
- Gather valuable loot as fast as you can to keep the chain timer alive and increase your chain count.
- Earn points with each valuable collected. Obtain them in quick succession to increase the points multipliers.
"SPECIAL LOOT HUNT" MODE
- Special Loot has been hidden somewhere in the environment. Use the Hot & Cold indicators provided to locate each one.
- When a Special Loot is collected, the next one becomes available. Hunt down and steal as many as you can within the time limit.
- Collect coins to increase the time on the clock and earn additional points.
"CHAIN & GAIN LIMITED" MODE
- Same as the Chain & Gain, but with an overall time limit.
THE BANK HEIST MISSION
- Additional mission to play.
- As the Master Thief, infiltrate the CityÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most secure location, Stonemarket First Bank, to steal a coveted family heirloom called the Star of Auldale.
- To this day, this heavily guarded and treacherous place remains impregnable, but thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s about to change.
- A challenging mission that will put your thieving skills to the test.
- Outsmart security measures found exclusively in this mission.
- Search for the BankÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s unique loot and many other secrets.
OPPORTUNIST BOOSTER PACK
- Quiver Capacity Level 3
- 10 Choke arrows
- 10 Poppy flowers
- 750 Gold
GHOST BOOSTER PACK
- Lockpick Quality Level 3
- 40 Water arrows
- 20 Rope arrows
- 750 Gold
PREDATOR BOOSTER PACK
- Bow Balancing Level 3
- 10 Sawtooth arrows
- 10 Food
- 750 Gold

thanks to Fugazi and OPOISSO893
